categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Morint was a female Human who served as a private in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War, she was stationed at Dorn Base on the planet Hoth, where she distributed armor to other Imperial forces.
Private Morint appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Light Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth.
